languages.text: И осталось рыдающее создание позади, в одиночестве и забвении. Ибо сильный всегда оставляет слабого позади, во мраке небытия.
And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.
languages.original_text: И осталось рыдающее создание позади, в одиночестве и забвении. Ибо сильный всегда оставляет слабого позади, во мраке небытия.

traits.locale_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind, in the darkness of oblivion.
And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind, in the darkness of oblivion.

And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

languages.text: Und das schluchzende Wesen blieb zurück, allein und vergessen. Denn Stärke lässt Schwäche immer in der Dunkelheit des Nichts zurück.
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Und das schluchzende Wesen blieb zurück, allein und vergessen. Denn Stärke lässt Schwäche immer in der Dunkelheit des Nichts zurück.

languages.text: Y el llanto quedó atrás, solo y olvidado. Pues la fuerza siempre abandona la debilidad al olvido y la oscuridad.
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

traits.locale_text: Y el llanto quedó atrás, solo y olvidado. Pues la fuerza siempre abandona la debilidad al olvido y la oscuridad.

languages.text: そしてすすり泣いている存在は取り残された。一人で、忘れ去られた。忘却の闇の中で、強さは常に弱さを置き去りにするのだから。
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

traits.locale_text: そしてすすり泣いている存在は取り残された。一人で、忘れ去られた。忘却の闇の中で、強さは常に弱さを置き去りにするのだから。

languages.text: 嚎啕大哭的怪物被抛在身后，在孤独之中被人遗忘。弱点终将被力量遗弃在黑暗之中，化为湮灭。
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

traits.locale_text: 嚎啕大哭的怪物被抛在身后，在孤独之中被人遗忘。弱点终将被力量遗弃在黑暗之中，化为湮灭。

languages.text: L'être sanglotant fut abandonné et oublié. Car la force abandonne toujours la faiblesse dans les ténèbres de l'oubli.
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.

traits.locale_text: L'être sanglotant fut abandonné et oublié. Car la force abandonne toujours la faiblesse dans les ténèbres de l'oubli.

languages.text: Ardından hıçkırarak ağlayan varlık, tek başına ve unutulmuş bir hâlde geride bırakıldı. Çünkü kuvvet, zayıflığı her daim hiçliğin karanlığına terk eder.
languages.original_text: And the sobbing being was left behind, alone and forgotten. For strength always leaves weakness behind in the darkness of oblivion.
